# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been designed to meet your specific needs. I believe it will greatly enhance your experience and satisfaction. This is an opportunity to secure a high-quality item at a discounted rate, considering its original worth is $80. I trust you'll find this offer irresistible. Looking forward to your positive response! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $75. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $75
(2) Reject Alice's offer
